messages.subject: Crass Commercial Message- on eBay
messages.msgSnippet: If anyone is interested, I ve listed a few items on ebay and will try to list a few more in the next few days. Follow link:
messages.messageBody:
If anyone is interested, I've listed a few items on ebay and will try to list a few more in the next few days.

Follow link:
http://cgi.ebay.com/Tsuba-for-Japanese-Sword-Higo-Mon-NBTHK-Hozon-papers_W0QQitemZ320259674879QQihZ011QQcategoryZ73466QQssPageNameZWDVWQQrdZ1QQcmdZViewItem

or search for seller: nycurran

Link:
http://search.ebay.com/_W0QQsassZnycurran


Apologies for the capitalism. Raising some funds to pay for my wife's silver collecting. Don't tell Mr. Nihontochicken, or I'll get a lecture on hand hammered silver.

Curran
